channel.title: What do i do about this?
channel.description:
How do i fix it so nobody can make admin or mod names?
example: mod namehere, admin namehere

item.title: What do i do about this?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

no i mean that people are making admin names

like admin sam
mod bob

i dont want them to have admin names because it will confuse the other players…

Read full topic
item.source: What do i do about this?

item.title: What do i do about this?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Usually you’ll have a file in your source file which has 2 .txt files, named ‘moderators’ and ‘administrators’. People put names in there, so that when they release their servers and people download them, they can log on and automatically be granted either position. Simply go in and remove all of the names.

Read full topic
